org.apache.twill.internal

Class Constants

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.twill.internal.Constants

  • public final class Constants
extends Object
    This class contains collection of common constants used in Twill.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Constants.Files
      Constants for names of internal files that are shared between client, AM and containers.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int APPLICATION_MAX_START_SECONDS
      Maximum number of seconds for AM to start.
      static int APPLICATION_MAX_STOP_SECONDS
      Maximum number of seconds for AM to stop.
      static int CONSTRAINED_PROVISION_REQUEST_TIMEOUT
      Milliseconds AM should wait for RM to allocate a constrained provision request.
      static String DISCOVERY_PATH_PREFIX
      Common ZK paths constants.
      static String INSTANCES_PATH_PREFIX 
      static String LOG_TOPIC 
      static long PROVISION_TIMEOUT 
      static String RESTART_ALL_RUNNABLE_INSTANCES
      Command names for the restart runnable instances.
      static String RESTART_RUNNABLES_INSTANCES 
      static String TWILL_APP_NAME
      Constants for twill variable names.
      static String TWILL_CONTAINER_CLASSLOADER
      Constant for the system property name that carries the class name for the container ClassLoader as defined by user.

      • CONSTRAINED_PROVISION_REQUEST_TIMEOUT

        public static final int CONSTRAINED_PROVISION_REQUEST_TIMEOUT
        Milliseconds AM should wait for RM to allocate a constrained provision request. On timeout, AM relaxes the request constraints.
        See Also:
